demos.name: Communications Toolbox Support Package for Analog Devices ADALM-PLUTO Radio

description.p: Communications Toolbox Support Package for Analog Devices ADALM-PLUTO Radio provides a library of blocks and System objects to utilize PlutoSDR hardware to design and prototype systems that process real-time wireless signals in MATLAB® and Simulink®

website.a: Documentation for Analog Devices ADALM-PLUTO Radio
